body.p: The Gentoo UK 2005 Conference is going to be held this Saturday 12th March 2005, at the University of Salford, Manchester, UK. The event is free; just come along on the day to meet Gentoo developers and users, and see what's going on with your favourite distro. There's a social event the night before (Fri 11th March), starting at 7:30pm at the Stay Inn, join us there for a drink or two!
